name: Yuzuriha_Inori 楪祈
description:
Trigger word: yuzuriha_inori

You can change her clothes more easily without the trigger word.

不加触发词的话，换衣服比较容易。

Some models are naughty and like adding clothes for Inori, so "center_opening" tag is advised to add.

一些模型比较淘气喜欢给祈妹加衣服，遇到这种情况建议加个“center_opening”的tag。

According to my experiment, you might need to add a little bit more weight ( such as 1.1) if you wan to apply this lora to ChilloutMix-Ni with a lot of Negtive Prompts.

根据我的实验，如果反咒很多，而你想在ChilloutMix-Ni上生效，或许需要多加一点点权重，比如1.1。

meta.prompt: masterpiece,1girl,solo, <lora:InoriV1:1>,depth of field, yuzuriha inori, sitting, closed mouth, ruins,cross,night,full moon, full body:1.3,depth of field,  sit_on_throne, light smile,
